participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, always looking for ways to improve her surroundings.
participant_1.background: I am trying to improve my relationships with the people I love. I'm always trying to find new ways to make our home feel more like our own. I work at a bar. I sing in the church choir every Sunday. I go for a walk every morning to relieve stress and have some time to myself.

participant_2.name: Morgan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and free-spirited, enjoys exploring nature and being authentic.
participant_2.background: I live in the forest, where I am free to explore and be myself. My favorite phone is an iPhone. Others get to see a happy, healthy me on my days off. I grew up in the deep south. I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.

content.text: Hi there! I'm going for a walk in the forest today.
Hi! That sounds so fun. I love the forest. I live there.
Really? That's awesome! I wish I could live in the forest.
It's really peaceful and quiet. I love it.
What's it like to live in the forest?
It's amazing. I love being able to explore and be myself. I have a lot of freedom here.
That sounds so great. I'm jealous.
What do you do for work?
I work at a bar. It's not my favorite job, but it pays the bills.
Oh, that's cool. I've never been to a bar.
You should come to my bar sometime. I'll give you a free drink.
I'd love to! I'll have to take you up on that.
Awesome! Let me know when you're free.
